caption.p: Projected ambient PM 2.5 exposure over the Indian landmass. Projected PM 2.5 exposure is averaged over India for future under both RCP4.5 and RCP8.5 scenarios. Shaded part represents the range (1–99%) in all-India averaged PM 2.5 across the 13 CMIP5 models. The black line represents the all-India averaged baseline (2001–2005) PM 2.5 exposure level. Solid and dashed lines indicate the projected exposure using approach 1 and approach 2, respectively.
